org.omancode.util.swing
Class PrefsOrSaveFileChooser

java.lang.Object
  org.omancode.util.swing.PrefsOrSaveFileChooser

public class PrefsOrSaveFileChooser
extends Object

A Swing file chooser that checks the preferences before prompting the user to save a file. Also retains the last directory selected across invocations in the preferences.

Version:
$Revision: 32 $
Author:
Oliver Mannion

Constructor Detail

PrefsOrSaveFileChooser

public PrefsOrSaveFileChooser(Preferences prefs)
Construct an instance using prefs from caller. Sets the JFileChooser current directory to the last directory saved in the caller's prefs.

Parameters:
prefs - the caller's Preferences

PrefsOrSaveFileChooser

public PrefsOrSaveFileChooser(Class<?> prefsClass)
Construct an instance using the preferences for the supplied class.

Parameters:
prefsClass - class to look up prefs for. If null uses prefs for FileUtil.class.
Method Detail

getFile

public File getFile(String prefsKey)
             throws IOException
Convenience method that prompts to overwrite for files of any type and saves the result to prefs. Uses the default prompt ( DEFAULT_PROMPT).

Parameters:
prefsKey - key to lookup stored filename.
Returns:
File specified in prefs, or selected in the dialog by user.
Throws:
IOException - if no valid file is selected when prompted.

getFile

public File getFile(String prefsKey,
                    String prompt,
                    FileFilter filter,
                    boolean saveFileSelectedToPrefs,
                    boolean promptForOverwrite)
             throws IOException
Lookup the file from the prefs, or if it doesn't exist prompt the user via a save file dialog.

Parameters:
prefsKey - key to lookup stored filename.
prompt - prompt message to ask user to select a file.
filter - file filter used in the select file dialog. If null, then no filter applied and any type of file can be selected.
saveFileSelectedToPrefs - if true save the file selected to the prefs
promptForOverwrite - prompt user to overwrite if selected file exists
Returns:
File specified in prefs, or selected in the dialog by user.
Throws:
IOException - if no valid file is selected when prompted.

showSaveDialogPromptOverwrite

public File showSaveDialogPromptOverwrite(String dialogTitle,
                                          Component parent,
                                          FileFilter filter)
Show a JFileChooser save file dialog, prompting to overwrite if the file already exists. Saves the directory last navigated to into the preferences.

Parameters:
dialogTitle - file chooser's dialog title
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
filter - file filter used in the select file dialog. If null, then no filter applied and any type of file can be selected.
Returns:
selected File, or null if cancel selected.

showSaveDialog

public File showSaveDialog(String dialogTitle,
                           Component parent,
                           FileFilter filter)
Show a JFileChooser save file dialog. Saves the directory last navigated to into the preferences.

Parameters:
dialogTitle - file chooser's dialog title
parent - the parent component of the dialog; can be null
filter - file filter used in the select file dialog. If null, then no filter applied and any type of file can be selected.
Returns:
selected File, or null if cancel selected.
